mentionedBy.name: CyberArk Software
mentionedBy.notes: Formed from 2021 merger of Thycotic and Centrify, offering comprehensive PAM solutions with Secret Server and cloud-ready modern PAM based on Zero Trust principles, focusing on securing legacy and cloud environments with seamless integration

mentionedBy.name: CyberArk Software
mentionedBy.notes: Product of merger between Thycotic and Centrify. Provides comprehensive PAM solution that's easy to install, configure, and manage. Offers series of top PAM solutions companies can combine to customize access management capabilities. Includes Secret Server.
